These decreases in SDTR primarily occurred in winter and there were non-significant decreases in SDTR during summer and autumn and a non-significant increase during spring. Therefore, the annual decrease in SDTR was primarily attributed to the large decrease in winter. This dominant influence of winter on DTR is consistent with previous studies [ 5, 6].
